subject: Your Repair is Complete
text:
Reference Number: <ID>
Items Received: <ITEMS>

Hello <NAME>,

We are happy to let you know that your system has been repaired and ready for pickup. Please visit us anytime Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm to pick up your items.

Remember to bring a valid picture ID, as we require one to release your system back to you. No items can be returned without providing a valid picture ID.

Thank you,
Student Technology Support Staff

Hello ,

We are happy to let you know that your system has been repaired and ready for pickup. Please visit us anytime Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm to pick up your items.

Remember to bring a valid picture ID, as we require one to release your system back to you. No items can be returned without providing a valid picture ID.
